C

calculateBirths() - Method in class Fish
If a fish is old enough to breed and passes a breeding probability test it returns a random number of births based on the maximum litter size.
calculateNearestToLeader(List<Location>, Location) - Method in class Herring
Calculates the nearest location to a given location, used to find a location nearest to a leader herring.
calculateTranslation(Location) - Method in class Location
Takes a location and calculates the translation needed to get there from this location.
chooseNextLocation(List<Location>) - Method in class Fish
Abstract methods unique to each subtype of fish.
chooseNextLocation(List<Location>) - Method in class Groper
Gropers will just move to the first free location in their surroundings
chooseNextLocation(List<Location>) - Method in class Herring
Herring chose where they would most like to move to, they prefer to follow a leader to maintaining direction.
chooseNextLocation(List<Location>) - Method in class Shark
If sharks are told to avoid other sharks they will look at empty location in their surroundings and preference each one based on how far away they are from other sharks in their surroundings
clearFish() - Method in class Ocean
Removes all fish from every ocean square in the ocean squares array.
